CustomField.description: What is the Account's ranking? (based on employee size)
CustomField.formula: IF( ISNULL(NumberOfEmployees), "Unknown", IF( ISPICKVAL(Account_Category__c,"Strategic Account"),"Strategic", IF( ISPICKVAL(Account_Category__c,"Regional"),"Regional", IF(NumberOfEmployees <250,"SMB", IF(NumberOfEmployees <5000,"Inside", "Field")))))
CustomField.label: Default Rating
